title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7009.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7009.1 - Policy

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with
the requirements of this Part, each local correctional facility shall maintain
a facility food service program sufficient to satisfy the daily nutritional
needs of each prisoner. (b) All
food service areas, including but not limited to kitchens, dining areas and
food storage areas, shall be maintained in accordance with the provisions of
section
7015.2
of this Title. (c) A food service organization which
provides food services for a local correctional facility must comply with the
requirements of this Part and with the requirements of the State Sanitary Code
as contained in 10 NYCRR Part
14. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7009.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
